column4: hmm.. then don't use all the disk, and perhaps dual-boot to windows etc
root/ - 8gb, swap - 2gb ,  /usr - 16gb  /var - 8 gb  /home rest of the space
on /home, make   /home/squid to host squid, and /home/vids or whatever you want for your vids
in that way, you are not running out of space :)
